Meh just vibe checking this place.

Capitalism never really eliminated feudalism. It still exists in large parts of the world. Mining and farming in many places in still feudalistic. Human trafficking.  Drug trafficking is largely feudalistic.

Capitalism is a marginal improvement over socialism, better wages but 0 power. Socialism is an improvement over capitalism. Why don't people grasp that ?
